english.segment1: It won't be long. Till we'll be leavin' here. It won't be long. We'll be goin' home
english.segment2: It won't be long. Till we'll be leavin' here. It won't be long. We'll be goin' home
english.segment3: Count the years as months. Count the months as weeks. Count the weeks as days. Any day now. We'll be goin' home
english.segment4: It won't be long. Till we'll be leavin' here. It won't be long. We'll be goin' home
english.segment5: It won't be long. Till we'll be leavin' here. It won't be long. We'll be goin' home
english.segment6: Count the years as months. Count the months as weeks. Count the weeks as days. Any day now. We'll be goin' home
english.segment7: We shall be like Him. We shall be like Him. We shall be like Him. Any day now. We'll be goin' home
english.segment8: We shall be like Him. We shall be like Him. We shall be like Him. Any day now. We'll be goin' home
english.segment9: It won't be long. It won't be long. It won't be long. We'll be goin' home
english.segment10: It won't be long. It won't be long. It won't be long. We'll be goin' home
